dc_title_s: A historical and classical atlas, illustrating, by a series of maps and charts, ancient history and geography, both sacred and profane; and, Grecian and Roman mythology. With two additional charts, illustrating civil and ecclesiastical history, from the birth of Christ to the present time.
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: A historical and classical atlas\, illustrating\, by a series of maps and charts\, ancient history and geography\, both sacred and profane; and\, Grecian and Roman mythology. With two additional charts\, illustrating civil and ecclesiastical history\, from the birth of Christ to the present time.
dc_description_s: With two additional charts, illustrating civil and ecclesiastical history, from the birth of Christ to the present time.
